com.axelor.studio.service

Class FormRecorderService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.axelor.studio.service.FormRecorderService

  • public class FormRecorderService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class generate form view from ViewEditor of type 'form'. It use ViewPanels to generate panels of formView. Also generate onNew action from default value given in view field.
    Author:
    axelor

      • getView

                                              throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
        Root method to access the service. It will generate FormView from ViewEditor
        Parameters:
        viewEditor - ViewEditor record of type form.
        Returns:
        FormView
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException

      • processFormView

        private void processFormView(com.axelor.meta.schema.views.FormView formView)
        Method update formView record by adding panels, toolbar buttons and onNew action into it.
        Parameters:
        formView - FormView generated from parent view.

      • processToolBar

        private java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.views.Button> processToolBar(java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.views.Button> toolbar)
        Method generate final list of buttons to keep in formview. It removes old button and add new button as per ViewEditor toolbar.
        Parameters:
        toolbar - List of buttons of Parent form view.
        Returns:
        List of button to keep in formView.

      • getUpdatedAction

        private java.lang.String getUpdatedAction(java.lang.String actions)
        Method to update onSave string with new actions.
        Parameters:
        actions - String of actions separated by comma.
        Returns:
        String of updated actions with onSave.

      • updatePanelInclude

        private java.lang.Integer updatePanelInclude(java.util.Iterator<com.axelor.meta.schema.views.AbstractWidget> itemIterator,
                                   java.lang.Integer index)
        Method to add items of form view refer by panel include in place of panel include in formViewItems.
        Parameters:
        itemIterator - FormView item(AbstractWidget) iterator.
        index - Index of panel include in formViewItems.
        Returns:
        updated index.

        private void mapPanels(java.util.Iterator<com.axelor.meta.schema.views.AbstractWidget> widgetIterator,
             java.lang.String level,
             java.lang.Integer levelCounter)
        Method to update panelMap with generated paneLevel as key and Panel as value.
        Parameters:
        widgetIterator - Iterator of formView items.
        level - Parent panel level
        levelCounter - Current level counter.

      • updateFields

        public void updateFields(ViewPanel viewPanel,
                java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.views.AbstractWidget> panelItems)
        Method update list of AbstractWidgets (fields) with fields of ViewPanel.
        Parameters:
        viewPanel - Panel from where field to fetch for update.
        panelItems - List of fields to update.

      • checkDefaultValues

        private void checkDefaultValues(java.lang.String fieldType,
                      java.lang.String fieldName,
                      ViewField viewField)
        Method check if default value is there for ViewField. If defaultValue is there it will update defaultFields list that will be used in onNew action generation.
        Parameters:
        fieldType - Type of field
        fieldName - Name of field
        viewField - ViewField to check for default vale.

      • setField

        private void setField(java.lang.String fieldName,
            ViewField viewField,
            java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.views.AbstractWidget> panelItems)
        Method update PanelItems list with new item created from viewField.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - Name of field
        viewField - Source field.
        panelItems - Destination list to update.

      • setPanelRelated

        private void setPanelRelated(java.lang.String fieldName,
                   ViewField viewField,
                   java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.views.AbstractWidget> panelItems)
        Method to add panel related for o2m/m2m types of relational field. It will add PanelRelated object created from viewField into list of panelItems of parent panel.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - Name of relational field.
        viewField - ViewField of relational type.
        panelItems - List of items of parent panel.

      • addOnNewAction

        private void addOnNewAction(com.axelor.meta.schema.views.FormView formView)
        Method generate ActionRecord from defaultFields and using form view details. Also it set onNew of formView.
        Parameters:
        formView - Updated form view with onNew action.

      • getOnNewActionName

        private java.lang.String getOnNewActionName(java.lang.String model,
                                  java.lang.String formName,
                                  java.lang.String xmlId)
        Method create onNew action name.
        Parameters:
        model - Full name of model.
        formName - Name of form view where onNew will be added.
        xmlId - of form view
        Returns:
        Name of onNew action.

        Method remove old defaultFields and update new default field of ActionRecord.
        Parameters:
        actionRecord - ActionRecord to update.
